name: Responsive Slider
author: coffeestudios

sections.description:
Create awesome SEO optimized responsive slideshows, with no effort at all!

This is a very simple and minimalistic image slider and carousel made for WordPress, it is based on Flex Slider, it is displayed by a simple shortcode. The slideshow is fully SEO optimized, alt text will be outputtet correctly, links are nofollow, the code is light weight and much more. This plugin will improve your ranking. This plugin is a fork of Matthew Ruddy slider called Easingslider which you can find on WordPress.org if you search for it.

If you have questions regarding the plugin write to me at coffeestudios@outlook.com

Shortcodes:
To see all shortcodes please go to Slideshows > All Slideshows

Add to template example:

Shortcode example:
[coffeeslideshow id=”1″]

Abilities

  • Alt text on images
  • Light code
  • SEO Optimized
  • Responsive Design
  • Custom Width
  • Custom Height
  • Crop and resize images
  • Transition
  • Pagination icons
  • Next/previous arrows
  • Next/previous arrows position
  • Next/previous arrows on hover
  • Automatic change slide
  • Automatic change slide duration
  • Automatic change slide pause duration
  • Shortcode
  • Shortcodes in PHP
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” page in WordPress.
  3. After activating a new menu item “Slideshows” appears
  4. Click add new slideshow and have enjoy!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” page in WordPress.
  3. After activating a new menu item “Slideshows” appears
  4. Click add new slideshow and have enjoy!
